greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers, the even bisection of A245606 halved: a(n) = A245606(2*n)/2.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of related permutations:
For all n >= 0, a(2^n) = A245708(2^n). Moreover, A245709 gives all such k that a(k) = A245708(k).
program: A003961(n) = my(f = factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f); \\ This function from _Michel Marcus_
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 29 2014
